Class NumberSpinner

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.i18n.client.HasDirection, com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasFocus, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasName, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.HasText, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesChangeEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesClickEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesFocusEvents, com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.SourcesKeyboardEvents, HasDojo
public class NumberSpinner
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.TextBox
implements HasDojo

This class wraps the dojo NumberSpinner. It's a simple number spinner with typematic and validation constraints

Author:
rdunklau

getDojoName

public java.lang.String getDojoName()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Returns the name of the dojo widget example : FisheyeList This method is used to load the scripts JavaScript for Dojo and create the dojo widget. See the Dojo documentation to know the good name.

Specified by:
getDojoName in interface HasDojo
Returns:
the name of dojo widget

createDojoWidget

public void createDojoWidget()
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Creates the widget Dojo using JSNI for the most of the cases. This method is not to be executed directly in your widget GWT, a controller has to execute it.

Specified by:
createDojoWidget in interface HasDojo
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the dojo widget can't be created. Warning, check the parameters and their type of JavaScript objects when JSNI is used. A JavaScript error can cause a fatal failure for the module.

doAfterCreation

public void doAfterCreation()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Do something after that the widget Dojo is created. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

Specified by:
doAfterCreation in interface HasDojo

doBeforeDestruction

public void doBeforeDestruction()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Do something before the desctruction of the Dojo widget, use this method to free some memory tp prevent memory leak. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

Specified by:
doBeforeDestruction in interface HasDojo

free

public void free()
Description copied from interface: HasDojo
Free,turn to null the resource taken by the Dojo widget in the GWT widget. Don't use directly this method, use a Dojo controller instead : DojoController

Specified by:
free in interface HasDojo

Returns the Dojo widget

Specified by:
getDojoWidget in interface HasDojo
Returns:
a JavaScript Object corresponding to the widget Dojo.

isIntermediateChanges

public boolean isIntermediateChanges()
Returns:
true if the spinner fires an on change event each time an arrow is pressed, false if it fires it only when it loses focus

setIntermediateChanges

public void setIntermediateChanges(boolean intermediateChanges)
Parameters:
intermediateChanges - : true if the spinner fires an on change event each time an arrow is pressed, false if it fires it only when it loses focus
